availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: French was a farmer in Breckinridge County. He married Mahala Ann Bassinger on August 28 1861.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Lycurgus French (April 1834-October 5, 1872,” Memorial 335989752, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=35989752 (accessed June 4, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge, District 1, p. 29; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Breckinridge County Marriages, p. 1.
